metadata.title: CVE-2021-47403 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ipack:ipoctal: fix module reference leak A reference to the carrier module wastaken on every open but was only released once when the final reference tothe tty struct was dropped. Fix this by taking the module reference andinitialising the tty driver data when installing the tty.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
